alert.note: Alert for White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 01 at 5:21PM MST until December 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 6500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches from 6500 to 7500 feet. Higher amounts of 3 to 5 inches above 7500 feet. * WHERE...Areas above 6500 feet near Alpine, Pinetop-Lakeside, Show Low and Whiteriver. * WHEN...Until to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Hazardous travel conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Additional snow forecast from 5 PM Today to 5 AM Saturday: Alpine 0 to 1 inches Pinetop-Lkside 0 to 1 inches Show Low 0 to 1 inches Whiteriver 0 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
